revised_title: Experimental Production of Congenital Goitre in Goats
tldr: The study investigates the experimental production of congenital goitre in goats by exposing pregnant females to toxic and goitrigenous agents during intrauterine life. The results show a high incidence of goitre in the offspring of goitrous mothers and the importance of factors such as infection, muzzling, and maternal goitre in the development of congenital goitre.
